name: hypnotized
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
hypnotize
to put someone in a state of hypnosis: She agreed to be hypnotized to try to remember what had happened.
[ T usually passive ] to keep your attention so strongly that you feel unable to move or look away: I was hypnotized by his steely grey eyes.
